ADLSLSOverlappedMode Struct Reference

Structure containing information about the overlap offset info for all the displays for each SLS mode. More...


Data Fields

ADLMode SLSMode
 the SLS mode for which the overlap is configured
int iNumSLSTarget
 the number of target displays in SLS.
int iFirstTargetArrayIndex
 the first target array index in the target array

Detailed Description

Structure containing information about the overlap offset info for all the displays for each SLS mode.

This structure is used to store the no. of overlapped modes for each SLS Mode once user finishes the configuration from Overlap Widget

Field Documentation

ADLMode ADLSLSOverlappedMode::SLSMode

the SLS mode for which the overlap is configured

int ADLSLSOverlappedMode::iNumSLSTarget

the number of target displays in SLS.

int ADLSLSOverlappedMode::iFirstTargetArrayIndex

the first target array index in the target array
